title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7425.3 - Congregate religious activities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7425.3 - Congregate religious activities

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of section
7425.1
(c) of this

Part, residents shall be permitted to congregate in an appropriate area for the
purpose of religious worship and other religious activities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7425.3

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
